news_items.title: Mayor to champion Hull and East Yorkshire at major business event
news_items.description: Luke will meet with investors, developers, and businesses across all sectors looking to establish or enhance their presence in Hull and East Yorkshire.

news_items.title: The Right to Grow scheme is now open for applications
news_items.description: The Right to Grow scheme gives communities the ability to plant and grow on Council-owned land. Applications are now open.

news_items.title: Let's Go Electric!
news_items.description: Hull City Council and East Riding of Yorkshire Council are teaming up with Let's Experience Electric to host the area’s first electric vehicle event at the Priory Park and Ride site.

news_items.title: High ropes course open for bookings
news_items.description: Hull Adventure Centre’s exhilarating new high ropes course is open to be public.
